title: "Update Failed Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information."
body: Dose anyone know how to fix this?

replies.body: i have same problem. it stops on 437 file... i dont know what to do.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/OAz4Weo0-solved-621-patching-error-using-vpn

i solved it with the help of riot
I'm having the same issue. I've reinstalled about 5 times today, repaired it twice now, and done every possible "fix" available. Gets stuck around 515MB Step 2/2
I'm happy to help, but need more details.  What % exactly are you receiving the error?  That will help pinpoint the issue.  Let me know!
It dose not move from 33% it stays there and the files scan to 250 to 260 the gives me that error

At 33% your patcher has finished scanning files, and needs to connect to the patching server to download updates.  Unfortunately, it looks like your network is having issues making that connection.  Go over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to help fix this up!  Let me know if you have any questions.
Umm there isn't anything on that link that can help me i am already on wired the NA server is fine
